com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface Buildable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AppleBuildable, JavaLibrary
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AaptPackageResources, AbstractBuildable, AbstractNativeBuildable, AndroidBinary, AndroidInstrumentationApk, AndroidLibrary, AndroidManifest, AndroidResource, ApkGenrule, AppleAssetCatalog, AppleResource, BuckExtension, BuildConfig, ComputeExopackageDepsAbi, CppBinary, CppLibrary, DefaultJavaLibrary, DexProducedFromJavaLibrary, DummyRDotJava, ExportFile, GenAidl, GenParcelable, Genrule, GwtBinary, GwtModule, IosBinary, IosLibrary, IosTest, JavaBinary, JavaTest, Keystore, MacosxBinary, MacosxFramework, NdkLibrary, PackageStringAssets, PrebuiltJar, PrebuiltNativeLibrary, PreDexMerge, ProjectConfig, PythonBinary, PythonLibrary, ResourcesFilter, RobolectricTest, ShBinary, ShTest, UberRDotJava, XcodeNative, XcodeProjectConfig, XcodeWorkspaceConfig

    public interface Buildable
    Represents something that Buck is able to build, encapsulating the logic of how to determine whether the rule needs to be rebuilt and how to actually go about building the rule itself.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        BuildableProperties getProperties()

      • getInputsToCompareToOutput

        Collection<Path> getInputsToCompareToOutput()
        Get the set of input files whose contents should be hashed for the purpose of determining whether this rule is cached.

        Note that inputs are iterable and should generally be alphabetized so that lists with the same elements will be .equals() to one another. However, for some build rules (such as Genrule), the order of the inputs is significant and in these cases the inputs may be ordered in any way the rule feels most appropriate.

      • getBuildSteps

        List<Step> getBuildSteps(BuildContext context,
                       BuildableContext buildableContext)
        When this method is invoked, all of its dependencies will have been built.

      • appendDetailsToRuleKey

        RuleKey.Builder appendDetailsToRuleKey(RuleKey.Builder builder)

      • getPathToOutputFile

        @Nullable
Path getPathToOutputFile()
        Returns:
        the relative path to the primary output of the build rule. If non-null, this path must identify a single file (as opposed to a directory). If the Buildable outputs multiple files, this returns null.
